summary: Found 2 errors and 0 warnings across 20 issues

problems.description: Dataclasses/enums (DailyGoal, Decision, GoalStatus, CheckpointTrigger, etc.) are required but none of their fields or enum members are defined, so the models and serialization tests cannot be implemented.
The config dataclasses are said to include “all weight fields” and other settings but those field names, types, and default values are never enumerated, leaving no concrete contract to code against.
